result.reason: The user requests the ability to open a duplicate session (new instance) by double-clicking a connection without holding the Ctrl key, which is a valid workflow enhancement.
result.approach: Add a new boolean setting 'DoubleClickOpensNewConnection' to ConnectionsPage and update OpenConnectionClickHandler to respect this setting by passing the 'Force.DoNotJump' flag when enabled.
